DOC.criteria: Severe peripheral vascular disease amenable bypass angioplasty Age > 40 year old Normal renal function ( creatinine < 1.6 ) Non pregnant female Lifespan > 6 month Age < 40 year old Refusal give inform consent and/orCognitively disable Congestive heart failure stroke last 3 month History cancer myeloproliferative disorder Proliferative retinopathy Pregnancy Positive screen test HIV , Hepatitis B Hepatitis C Buerger patient Cachexia predict impossibility biopsy least 30 gram fat tissue Pregnancy lactation Having non control severe pathology
